name: Property Map
short_description: View our full property map to locate all accommodations, as well as our orchard and farm.
meta_description: From yoga to poolside drinks, Topping Rose House is more than rooms in the Hamptons. Bicycles, a spa, events and luxurious accommodations. Book a stay today.
meta_title: Property Map | Topping Rose in Bridgehampton
description:
Our property map shows where hotel accommodations, our orchard and farm are located.

While varied in location and aesthetic, accommodations at Hamptons luxury hotel Topping Rose House are equally elegant. All feature plush bedding with linen by Frette, bath towels by Matouk, bathrobes by Chadsworth & Haig, and bath amenities by Farmaesthetics. Each room is anchored by Madeline Weinrib's uniquely designed rugs.

The House

Enjoy carefully restored details and the comfort of contemporary accommodation in our charming and historic House. Newly renovated, the House has two One-Bedroom Suites, three King Rooms, and two Twin Rooms which are convertible to Kings.

The Studio

Modern and airy, our three stylishly furnished Studio King Rooms are located on the second floor with stunning views of the property. Just two floors above the Spa, our Studio guestrooms are perfect for bridal parties or a relaxing weekend getaway.

The Cottages

Located between the Orchard and the Topping Rose Farm, our four Cottages offer the ultimate luxury experience. All Cottage accommodations feature private outdoor space, either a patio or roofdeck, and easy access to the fitness center below. Each Cottage can be booked as a single unit, perfect for families, or separately with two individual guestrooms on the ground floor and a King Suite on the second floor.
